entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
